mapper.delete: delete from noti_fest where id = #{id} and fes_id = #{fesId}
mapper.select: select f.* from festival f join noti_fest nf on f.fes_id = nf.fes_id where nf.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update festival set noti = noti - 1 where fes_id = #{fesId} and noti > 0
mapper.select: select count(*) from noti_fest where fes_id = #{fesId}
